data.name: Chimera Warfare
data.detailed_description:
Chimera Warfare is a game about evolution, which takes place in a microscopic world where it has been twisted by several sources of unknown power, carried by fallen stars. It eventually leads to an ever-changing world where the players immerse themselves as cellular creatures and thrive through the consumption of each other.

Game Features:
  • Single Player Game
  • Only Supports Mouse and Keyboard

Enemies:
  • Biters
  • Shooters
  • Bombers

Bosses:
  • Cell



Environment: Inspired by microbiology and fantasy, explore the water biome on a microscopic level and experience the horrors that befall microorganisms.


Mechanics: Use the mouse to move your organism. Player Evolution System with which to develop your organism, where player choices make or mar the organism. Defeat the boss and all its minions(enemies) to rule the biome.

This is currently a work in progress

data.short_description: Chimera Warfare is a fantasy-based survival evolution game located in a twisted world where strange creatures roam around and consume each other. In order to survive, you must craft yourself into a weapon through careful evolutionary choices. Can you do it though?

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 690 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
